name: Cheesy Trials
overview: You control a laboratory cloned Mouse called Echo who must partake in experiments for the reward of some Cheese. Each of the experiments is played within a 2D platform styled game, and as you work out the safest route to the cheese, more of the level will appear, or will be altered. And each nibble of Cheese must be collected within a short time limit. Once all of the cheese bits are had, an exit appears so that Echo may go to the next experiment, or even retry an experiment to see if a safer or better route is to be found. Source: https://retrogames.biz/thec64-winter-games-development-competition Hewco was the joint winner of the TheC64 Winter Games Development Competition 2020. This game needs 24k memory and was developed with Turbo Rascal. Instructions ------------ Control Echo the Mouse with the Joystick. Fire to jump. There are three experiments to complete each with a number of difficult rooms to challenge you. Press F1, F3 and F5 to jump between the three experiments.
